name: The Survival Game
description:
The FIS welcomes you!
At the beginning of the game, the player finds himself on one of the flying islands. His task is to survive. That is why the player needs to get everything he needs: food, boards for building houses, sticks and various minerals to create things with which the player will extract resources, and so on.

When the source island runs out of resources, the player will have to create a flying ball on which he will reach other islands. But there are not only ordinary islands, on which everything is green and beautiful, there are also dangerous islands: fiery, poisoned, dried up and completely frozen. In addition to the usual island, there are also small islands surrounding the usual one; on them you can find dungeons with useful and not very things. What awaits the player on his exciting journey?

Control:

WASD - Moving

Space - Jump

E - Taking items

LMB - Use items, when taked

RMB - Throw items

Q - Change Slot

Shift - Sprint

Ctrl - Crouch

I - Inventory

B - Creation menu
